backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing implemented PDF language changes and a new crypto mining explainer section with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files related to the MiningHub PDF generator.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and base layout behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, jsPDF, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the MiningHub PDF generator page.
frontend/src/content/mininghubPlan.ts: Typed Hindi content and configuration for the MiningHub investment plan, including crypto mining explainer and PDF copy strings.
frontend/src/features/calculator/incomeC: Utility functions for calculating monthly and total potential income.
frontend/src/features/pdf/downloadPdf.ts: Helper function that triggers browser download of a generated PDF.
frontend/src/features/pdf/generateMining: Main jsPDF generator building the multi-section Hindi investment plan PDF with images and formatting.
frontend/src/features/pdf/loadPdfImageAs: Loads local images as base64 for embedding into the generated PDF.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, setting global styles and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/MiningHubPdfGenerator: Implements the UI for generating and downloading the MiningHub investment plan PDF, displaying plan details and triggering PDF generation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and current progress relating to the MiningHub PDF generation functionality.
